message.content:
1. Physical fitness improved at discharge.
2. The improvement in physical fitness at discharge was statistically significant (p < 0.01).
3. Physical fitness improved at one-year follow-up.
4. The improvement in physical fitness at one-year follow-up was statistically significant (p < 0.01).
5. The improvements in physical fitness were observed in both groups.
6. There were no significant differences between the groups in terms of physical fitness improvement.
7. The p-value for the home-based group was 0.31.
8. The p-value for the centre-based group was 0.87.

messages.content:
Statement: Physical fitness improved at discharge (p < 0.01) and at one-year follow-up (p < 0.01) in both groups, without differences between groups (home-based p = 0.31 and centre-based p = 0.87).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
